testCases.label: Verify normalizationExercise uppercases and preserves letters
testCases.description: Checks that normalizationExercise('kool kitties') returns 'KOOL KITTIES', demonstrating correct uppercasing for the lab’s normalization task.

testCases.label: Verify normalizationExercise removes non-alphabetic characters
testCases.description: Ensures that normalizationExercise('F@ll') strips symbols and returns 'FLL', matching the lab’s expected text-cleaning behavior.

testCases.label: Verify normalizationExercise handles mixed characters and spacing
testCases.description: Validates that normalizationExercise('Fr33z3r #@$ brr') removes special characters, preserves numbers, and uppercases the result into 'FR33Z3R  BRR'.

testCases.label: Verify tokenizationExercise outputs correct word and sentence tokens
testCases.description: Checks that tokenizationExercise('Hello World!') produces both expected word tokens ['Hello', 'World', '!'] and sentence tokens ['Hello World!'], as required in the lab’s tokenization activity.

testCases.label: Verify findAllExercise returns correct semicolon-delimited matches
testCases.description: Confirms that findAllExercise returns the exact expected semicolon-separated string of matched words, demonstrating proper regex extraction for this lab exercise.
